about_the_game:
Package Unknown is a psychological horror game where a routine delivery job turns into a nightmare.

Your abusive boss forces you to work a late-night shift to clear a backlog of packages that must be sent. Before you even start your shift, a news report warns of a serial killer on the loose, setting a tense atmosphere for your night ahead. As you make your deliveries, bizarre events unfold: your GPS might malfunction, sending you to eerie places, or strange residents greet you at their doors. With the killer still at large, every interaction becomes suspect, blurring the line between ordinary and sinister as you struggle to complete your route.

Chill at home before your unexpected night shift starts

Eat a snack, change your clothes, and find your keys before you go to work.

Load your truck full of packages

Make sure you fit everything in so you get done with your shift as fast as possible.

Drive your truck

Drive to your destinations by following the navigation which shows you exactly where your next stop is.

Deliver packages

Place packages on people's porches (Or throw them :D). Make sure to also ring the bell for special packages to ensure they get in the right person's hands.

Talk to residence

Some residents will talk to you. You decide how to respond, changing the outcome of the entire game! These decisions don't just affect the immediate gameplay. The whole experience is built upon how you choose to handle specific situations.

Watch out for the killer

A chilling news report warns of a serial killer roaming the streets. As night falls, your task is clear: deliver the packages and avoid becoming the next victim.

Key Features

  • Multiple atmospheric environments with good graphics

  • Interesting package delivery mechanics

  • Weird encounters with NPC's

  • Multiple completely different endings based on your decisions

  • VHS film camera effect

name: Package Unknown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Deliver packages at night using your truck while a serial killer hunts your route in this psychological horror game.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
